name: Car Inverter 200W DC12V to AC100V Converter, 3 USB Ports with QC3.0 Fast Charging, TYP-C Support, Smart Display, Multi-Protection, Car Power Inverter for Charging & Power Supply
short_description: High Power Output – 200W Car Inverter for 24V Vehicles：This 200W high-output car power inverter efficiently converts your vehicle’s 12V DC power to 110V AC, making it ideal for powering multiple devices simultaneously. It supports a wide range of electronics, such as laptops, tablets, smartphones, car rice cookers, car fridges, portable fans, car vacuum cleaners, and water boilers. Whether you're traveling, camping, or preparing food and drinks on the go, this inverter ensures stable and reliable power wherever you are.

Versatile Output Ports – QC3.0, PD, AC & USB Power Supply：Equipped with 2 AC outlets, 1 QC3.0 fast charging port, 1 PD USB-C port, 2 USB 5V/3A ports, and a cigarette lighter socket, this inverter offers comprehensive support for both car appliances and digital devices, covering all your charging and power supply needs on the road.

Real-Time Smart Voltage Display – Monitor Vehicle Battery Health：The integrated smart display provides real-time monitoring of your vehicle's voltage. When the engine is running, the normal voltage range is 11.6V–16.0V; when the engine is off, it’s 11.6V–12.8V.

Built-in Intelligent Chip – Adaptive Power Delivery for All Devices：The cigarette lighter power socket includes an intelligent recognition chip that automatically detects each connected device's optimal voltage and current needs. This smart technology prevents overvoltage, overcurrent, and ensures safe charging for all connected electronics, from mobile phones to sensitive car gadgets.

Comprehensive Safety Protections – Reliable & Durable Design：To protect users and devices, this automotive power inverter is built with multiple safety protections, including overcharge protection, short-circuit protection, overload protection, overvoltage protection, undervoltage protection, electric shock protection, high-temperature protection, and impact resistance. In the event of an abnormal situation, the inverter will automatically shut down to protect both your car and your equipment.
Important Note：This inverter is designed specifically for 24V vehicles and outputs 220V AC. Please confirm that your connected devices support 220V output voltage before use.
